snippet.title: Best Media Player For Windows 8
snippet.description: VLC icon (Photo credit: Wikipedia) Question from the mailbox: I've upgraded my PC from Windows 7 to Windows 8. Overall I'm quite happy with it, but I have to admit that I'm not loving the new media player 'app' ... it doesn't even have volume control! Any ideas what I read »

snippet.title: 25 Things You Can Remote Control With Your iPhone
snippet.description: Since the iPhone App Store launched almost two years ago, developers have created hundreds of remote control applications. read »
